齓字的基本解释

齓
chèn
古同“龀”。

齓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chèn］
［《廣韻》初覲切，去震，初。］
［《廣韻》初謹切，上隱，初。］
“龀1”的繁体字。亦作“齓1”。
(1)儿童换齿。即脱去乳齿，长出恒齿。
(2)年幼。
(3)指年幼的人。

齓字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【齒字部】　齓； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1532第14
【集韻】同齔。【史記·周本紀】漦化爲黿，入王後宮，後宮之童妾旣齓而遭之。【韋昭曰】毀齒曰齓。

考證：〔【史記·周本紀】漦水爲黿，入王後宮，後宮之童妾，旣齓而遭之。【韋昭註】毀齒曰齓。〕　謹照原文漦水改漦化。韋昭註改韋昭曰。
齓字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
齓字的起名意思

暂无。

Terrible
Basic explanation of words
Terrible
chèn
Gu Tong "shou".
Terrible
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chèn］
["Guangyun" at the beginning of the cut, to shake, at the beginning. ]
["Guangyun" at the beginning of the cut, Shangyin, at the beginning. ]
Traditional characters for "龀1". Also known as "齓1".
(1) Children change teeth. That is, deciduous teeth are removed, and permanent teeth are grown.
(2) Young.
(3) Refers to young people.
Terrible
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Tooth Word Department] 　齓; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 1532 14
[Jiyun] the same as the same. 【Historical Records·Zhou Benji】The concubine of the harem was stunned when he entered the palace of the queen. [Wei Zhao said] Destroy the tooth and say terribly. Textual research: [[Historical Records·Zhou Benji] Lushui is a glutton, entering the palace of the queen, the child concubine of the harem, suffers sternly. [Wei Zhao's Note] Destroy a tooth and say terribly. 〔〕 　 I would like to change the water according to the original text. Wei Zhao's annotation changed Wei Zhao and said.
